name: Romper Needs Cheeseburgers
description:
Watch your back, cause Romper is off his leash and prowlin the neighborhood for burgers. It won't be easy tho, he'll have to contend with dead fish, spikes and insane puzzle platforming to chomp up the neighborhood's supply of patties.

Romper Needs Cheeseburgers is fun for any age.

Full version coming soon to iOS and Android platforms.

Z to JUMP

X to PAUSE
